document.full_text: the vaunted republican network of high-dollar donors and fund-raisers has been slow to commit itself, resulting in a faltering start to the party's drive to unseat president obama.
document.title: big g.o.p. donors adopt wait-and-see 2012 tack
lines_and_colors: the vaunted republican network of high-dollar donors and fund-raisers has been slow to commit itself, resulting in a faltering start to the party's drive to unseat president obama.
